short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save pages so you can read them later them even if they are no longer available!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create your own personal archive of articles and pages you want to read later, even after their content is changed or is no longer available!

We are in early stages, so expect some special cases not to be saved correctly. The pages are saved in several formats, including image snapshots and raw HTML.

Up to 3 free pages per day. Upgrade for more daily saves and supporting development.
